message: People post their startup ideas (whether they are considering making them or want someone else to) and people vote "pass" "try" or "buy".  Anyone could "take on" an idea, and multiple groups could, so it could show the groups that decide to (or already have) created a website that fits that category

Over time, a collection of startup ideas would be collected and ranked, so anyone interested in making something (but not sure what) could just see the most wanted websites that are't getting much development
Maybe something like this already exists?  I know that CaptainObvious is kind of close
